祝各位游戏愉快.

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight for OTOMATIC

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #otomatic #otomagic

This is a fully fictional sight package for the Italian OTOMATIC SPAAG, including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for ammo (APFSDS or HE-MOM & APFSDS), up to 6'400 meters
- Ranging funnels for APFSDS, configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for APFSDS, for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)

I included two variants: Scolia01 contains scales for both HE-MOM and

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses

This is a fully fictional sight package for 105mm canon armed tanks (USA, Italy

The "Chads, Circular, Universal, Minimal, Multi, Sight" or CCUMMS for short. I basically used a similar sight as Minedeployer universal [All credit to him] but has 2 circles that help a ton for very fast 500 to 1k adjustments for Dart guns firing 1500 m/s and above or is great for 250-500ish meter adjustment shots with older AP tanks like Tiger or 76mm US.

I also hate vertical line because it obstructs vision for micro-adjustments.

This sight is great for unzoomed MBTs because the circles show your general aim posture while not being stick at the 10x zoom. This makes 3x driving while FPS i

Hello, This is my universal sight. Perfect from low velocity tank destroyers, to most MBT's. It's pretty straight forward. Optimized for rangefinding, with it's column. That shows how much you should raise your gun to shoot at range. The maximum distance goes up to 10k meters/11k Yards. Besides that. There is 3 versions, each one having a different base crosshair size. 1x, 2x, 3x. Choose which one fits you best.

How to install? Just place the folder all_tanks in your usersight folder, and you'll be able to select it in every tank of every nation. Always ready.

Ayleen here <3

Nice low profile reticle for the Leclerc, this only works for the apfsds round.

Personnal simple sight for all tanks

You can use with standard view or gunner's view. Use telemetry in gunner's view for compensate the parralaxe.

The .zip file contain folder "all_tanks" and the file "Shang_simple_sight"

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-viseur-personalise/3448


You must select the sight for all tanks manually.

Tutorial / User Guide for Schindibee's SCOLIA Style Custom Sights

Hi folks!

This is just a pdf explaining in detail how my SCOLIA style sights work. Please check this if you are unsure how to use my sights, especially the stadiametric rangefinder, deflection aiming helps, etc....

#tutorial #readme #scolia #customsights

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight package for 90mm Family (M3, M3A1, M36, M41, M54, T15, T15E2, T54, Type 61 canons)

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #m36b1 #m26a1 #pershing #m26 #m26_t99 #super_hellcat #m36 #m46 #patton #m56 #scorpion #m48 #m47 #t26e4 #t26e1 #t32 #t32e1 #st_a1 #st_a2 #type61

This is a fully fictional sight package for 90mm canon armed tanks (USA, Italy, Germany and China), including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo (APCEB or HEAT-FS, depending on vehicle & sight)
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full

Universal sight for small and medium ranks

It is most convenient when using shells with a flat flight path. Vertical marking of range corrections helps to intuitively determine the distance to the enemy at medium distances.

The vertical lines of 800-1200 meters and 2000-3000 meters are given by the marks of range corrections in increments of 50 meters. For shells with flat ballistics, this looks like a solid line, with steep ballistics - dashed.

The following parameters are used to fine-tune the font size and thickness of the lines of the sight:
[fontSizeMult: r = X] -- scaling text and num

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight package for 17 pounders

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #firefly #firefly_ic #firefly_vc #challenger #avenger #a30_challenger #a30_avenger #black_prince #a43_black_prince #archer #17pder #aciv_thunderbolt #thunderbolt #tipo_ic #_m4_tipo_ic #m10_achilles #achilles #m10_17pdr_achilles #centurion_mk1 #centurion_1

This is a fully fictional sight package for all QF 17 pounder armed tanks, including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo (76.2 mm AP or APDS)
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (ful

Modifications of the sight type “Fero Z18” / “TZF-1A”

Adaptation to gaming realities. The lowest point of the circle on all sights corresponds to the 800 meter range correction for sub-caliber projectiles. The horizontal-vertical markings of the sight are used to determine the approximate distance to the target.

!!! After the last update game, many crosshairs are not displayed correctly.
I myself am from Ukraine, so for now I can’t quickly make changes to all sights...

Made for:
China: T-69 II G
Germany III: Ersatz M10, Panther D/A/F/G, Sd.Kfz.234/4, Tig...

To adjust font and line sze, change following parameters for individual use. Atm, they are at-
Daulity_v3_1:
fontSizeMult:r=0.5
lineSizeMult:r=0.95

simple_sight:
fontSizeMult:r=0.95
lineSizeMult:r=1

#simple #simplesight #sight #RB #AB

Zeroing set up to all shells max flight distance.

Now both sights are available for all vehicles (thanks to #Gaijin, finally they did that they should to when announced user-made sights).
